text: The first of Nagash's great and powerful edifices. Even millennia later it is still surrounded by fell magic.
The Pyramid seems to hum in the silent excitement of a pet crocodile.
Positively cracking with energy, and a threat visible from afar.
New and old chambers restored to their power, unconcealed dark magic flooding the stone and surroundings.
Manic laughter is felt rather than just heard in the entire region, as the Black Pyramid achieves lift off.
Dangerous spirits are bound within these chambers, and armed with foul intents.
Dangerous spirits are bound within these chambers, and armed with foul intents.
Dangerous spirits are bound within these chambers, and armed with foul intents.
Stalkers and guardians of desert and fortress. There is very little difference of stance, and a communality of deadly purposes.

Stables remind of hay, snorting muzzles, and swift noble creatures. These are not like that.

Dark magic and skeletal hands twist bones into machines of death.

A new addition to the Black Pyramid complex, a humming obelisk of dark stone to put most towers to shame.

Magical wards as ancient as Nagash himself, bolstering any undead fighting around the Black Pyramid.

Even the air around the Pyramid feels like knife stabs. Might be the skeleton hordes, though.

Tight, rampant tunnels within the oppressive weight of dark stone. Careful not to slip on the many skulls.

Multitudes of corrupted scarabs swarm over materials, crafting what the Great Necromancer needs.

There are many places in the world that have been tainted by dark magic and whole battlefields that bear the scars of fell sorcery.
Raised from mass graves and despoiled tombs, the dead gather amidst the tumbled ruins and blasted groves of this ill-favoured realm.
It was made by those who are Dead, and the Dead keep it.
There are many places in the world that have been tainted by dark magic and whole battlefields that bear the scars of fell sorcery.
Raised from mass graves and despoiled tombs, the dead gather amidst the tumbled ruins and blasted groves of this ill-favoured realm.
It was made by those who are Dead, and the Dead keep it.
Undead legions vast beyond human comprehension, utterly relentless and without mercy.
The age of the living is finally drawing to an end...
